task.title: Using the Epson Projector
task.shortdesc: To properly showcase your documents to the classroom, you will need to use the projector.

taskbody.prereq: Make sure the remote control to the projector has working batteries.

step.cmd: Press the top left blue power button on the remote control to turn on the projector.
A blue light on the projector will appear, confirming that the projector is turned on.
step.steptroubleshooting: If any problems occur, call the Epson Tech Department at 1-800-374-2948.

step.cmd: Using the appropriate buttons, use the remote as a pointer or to go to your next or previous slides.
When finished, turn the projector off the same way you turned it on.
